column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////This place gets crowded and there's always a line no matter what time I have come at.  When it's your turn at the counter
column3: and if it's pastries it will be plated and waiting for you at the register or you order a hot entrée or coffee you will get a number and your food/drink will be brought out to you when it's ready.  The pastries look almost too perfect to eat.
